column6: "text":"The pieces of the cat statue are hidden in shrines around the world!|There's a shrine a little to the north of here."}

"text":"It's so quiet here... | Meeeeowwwww..."}

column7: I can just walk to town..."}

"text":"Welcome to our home! Did you come to see the waterfall?"}
